attributes.name: Modification of OpenSSH Binaries v100.0.2
attributes.description: Adversaries may modify SSH related binaries for persistence or credential access by patching sensitive functions to enable unauthorized access or by logging SSH credentials for exfiltration.
author: Elastic
false_positives: Trusted OpenSSH executable updates. It's recommended to verify the integrity of OpenSSH binary changes.
attributes.query:
event.category:file and event.type:change and
 process.name:* and
 (file.path:(/usr/sbin/sshd or /usr/bin/ssh or /usr/bin/sftp or /usr/bin/scp) or file.name:libkeyutils.so) and
 not process.name:("dpkg" or "yum" or "dnf" or "dnf-automatic")
